attributes.action: resolve the present scandal of unacceptable and fraudulent expense claims by calling a general election to allow the electorate to pass judgement on their MPs and to allow the newly elected MPs to pass judgement on the Speaker.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
There is already a petition requesting the PM call an election. http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/

Issues relating to MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
